scripts.add-shebang: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const content = fs.readFileSync('build/index.js', 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('build/index.js', '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' + content);"
scripts.copy-files: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); fs.mkdirSync('build/spec', {recursive: true}); try { fs.cpSync('spec/reference', 'build/spec/reference', {recursive: true}); } catch(e) { console.log('spec/reference not found, skipping...'); } try { fs.copyFileSync('src/nodit-aptos-indexer-api-schema.json', 'build/nodit-aptos-indexer-api-schema.json'); } catch(e) { console.log('schema file not found, skipping...'); }"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run add-shebang && npm run copy-files
